title: Moving Service | Transportation | University of Illinois at Chicago
text: To provide the University with a comprehensive interdepartmental service that handles the timely movement, delivery, transportation, surplus and disposal of campus resources as needed by the UIC community.

*Departments having a need for moving services must initiate a work order in the FAMIS system. Work requests should be made as far in advance as possible, because services will be provided on a first-come, first-service basis. However, every attempt will be made to accommodate specialized needs and emergencies.

Prior to submitting an FMWeb Estimate Request, please contact the Facilities Management Movers at (312) 996-2841 or at moves@uic.edu to help you determine if an Estimate Request or one-time Billable Service Request is required.

Additionally, please refer to the UIC OBFS Standards for the Procurement, Transfer, Disposal, and Reallocation of University assets at https://www.obfs.uillinois.edu/bfpp/section-12-property-accounting/.

To submit a request, please use the FMWeb system. All University employees should be able to login into FMWeb using their University NetID and password.  If you experience a problem logging into FMWeb, please contact our Customer Support team at (312) 996-7511 or servdesk@uic.edu.
